skins.shipDescription: Gridley-class destroyer - McCall, Hull Number DD-400!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm McCall, third ship of the Gridley-class. There isn't much special about me, except that I've lived as long as my big sisters. I'm just relieved know that they're doing well.
skins.acquisition: Hello, Commander. Just call me McCall. I like to sleep, daydream, and eat popsicles. Please assign me somewhere peaceful, will you?
skins.login: Commander, can't I just sit around here for today instead?
skins.details: Sorry, can we keep it brief? I need a new popsicle.
skins.secretaryIdle1: We all get along around here, don't you think? Care for a popsicle?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ahh... Hawaii was so hot. I felt like I was melting...
skins.secretaryIdle3: ... Ah! Oh no! My popsicle melted.
skins.secretaryTouch: ... Are you trying to encourage me?
